chandaya prakasha kirime di jathika handunumpatha ho mathiwarana komasariswaraya nam kara athi ananyathawaya thahawuru kirime handunumpathak idiripath kirima athyawashya we.mewara mathiwaranaye ek wisheshathwayak wanne chandaya salakunu kirima sandaha methek bhawitha kala pansala wenuwata pana bhawitha kirimata mathiwarana komasariswaraya thiranaya kara thibimaya.me athara parlimenthu mathiwaranaya sandaha mewara piligath deshapalana paksha 36 k ha swadhina kandayam 301 k idiripath wi sitiyi.manthridhura 196 k sandaha tharaga wadina apekshakayinge sankhyawa 7,620 ki.mita amatharawa jathika layisthuwen thoraganena manthri dhura sankhyawa 29k we.
